title: Bricked Apple Watch? Apple pulls buggy watchOS 5.1 update after reports
description: ![Apple Watch4]()### Black Friday Smartwatch Deals – Deals live now and what to expect](https://www.trustedreviews.com/deals/smartwatch-black-friday-3333895 "BlackFriday Smartwatch Deals – Deals live now and what to expect")  * The company hasn’t released an official statement on the watcOS 5.1 glitch toour knowledge, but it’s safe to say this probably wasn’t the the footnote itwanted to its October hardware launch event.**Have you been hit by the Apple Watch bricking bug? Let us know on Twitter@TrustedReviews.**
